title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
Hello guys, I got this MP with the following problems. It turns on, the fan spins normally first then starts spinning faster, it charge, there is mouse activity, but there is no video, no chime and I noticed that the  PCH gets hot when it is on, also I found a short to GND on PP3v3_s0, and since there are so many parts involved on that rail I don't know where to start with. there is no sign of liquid or any part burned. Thanks in advance.

BR

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message: Post the exact ohm value to ground there.

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
Did you check without LCD connected?
If still low, you can try injecting voltage, no more than 4V.
Remove CPU heatsink and try to detect something hot on the board.

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
yes, with no LCD connected.
tried that but my dcps have and over-voltage protection functionality and because of the short is not allowing me to inject the 3.3 voltage. I selected 100 mA and nothing. do you think that if I turn off the OVP (over-voltage protection) nothing would happen?

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message: it looks like it is a dead PCH since the only thing that gets hot is the PCH, also noticed that PP3V3_SUS is shorted to GND too.

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
"I selected 100 mA and nothing"
Of course...
Let the amp to max when you inject voltage!!!

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message: I turned off the OVP and let the amp to the max, the only thing the gest hot is the PCH, I used a seek thermal camera for that

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
Bad luck then, dead PCH.
The good news, it can be changed.

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
too bad, I guess that I need a BGA machine for that. I do have one but I'm not sure I'll be able to do that job with that. I bought that very long time ago. please see the link and let me know what do you think about that cheap BGA rework station, and please also tell me where I can get the PCH.

[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.aliexpress.com/i/32590102165.html[/URL]

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
PCH can be bought on Aliexpress, or eBay.
T862 is a bulshit...

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message: I bought that T862 when I didn't know anything about repairs, then I realized that it was wasted money. which bga machine do you recommend, maybe it worth it try to spend some money on that.

title: 820-3115-B turn on, no video
message:
Nowadays, aquiring new BGA machine may not be a good deal.
Think if you can get jobs to pay it.
